content:
• Luxurious Duxiana mattresses
  • Elegant Frette sheets and bath linens
  • Custom-formulated red flower bath amenities
  • State-of-the-art air purification HVAC system containing UV light technology to eliminate airborne pathogens
  • Intelligent Lutron lighting enabling custom privacy settings
  • Dual, marble vanity bathroom with oversized walk-in shower
  • In-room safe
  • Mini refrigerators in every room
  • 65” high-definition Smart TV
  • Accessible rooms available
  • Filtered water hydration stations on each guest room floor
  • Hand-crafted chocolates at turndown 
  • In-room dining from acclaimed Chef Jean-Georges Vongerichten
  • The Counter, a delicious grab-and-go market serving fresh-brewed coffee and light bites each morning
  • Crawford's Bar, an intimate gathering place to enjoy handcrafted updates on the classic cocktail
  • Marigold by Jean-Georges, featuring the freshest farm-to-table cuisine with seasonal produce from our nearby farm
  • Spectacular indoor and outdoor event space
  • Custom-made event tents designed exclusively for Keswick Hall
  • Full Cry, 18-hole Pete Dye-designed golf course
  • European Red Clay Tennis Courts
  • The adult only Horizon Pool
  • Pavilion Pool
  • Spa (Coming Soon)
